sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Mostra } from 'src/app/models/mostra.model'; import { MostraService } from 'src/app/service/mostra.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-scrolling-card', templateUrl: './scrolling-card.component.html', styleUrls: ['./scrolling-card.component.scss'] }) export class ScrollingCardComponent implements OnInit{ mostre: Mostra[]; mostreFeatured: Mostra[]; constructor(private mostraService: MostraService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.mostraService.getMostre().subscribe({ next: (response) => { this.mostre = response; }, error: (err) =>{ console.log(err); } }) } getFeatured(): Mostra[]{ for(let mostra of this.mostre){ if(mostra.featured){ this.mostreFeatured.push(mostra); } } return this.mostreFeatured; } }
